      1. ‚Ä¶in reply to @zachleat
        Y‚Äôall might be interested to learn a few things about SASS output. First, SASS will output (min-width: 1200px) and (min-width: 400px) which *should* only apply at 1200px+. But IE11 applies it at 400px+ which is a bug! If min|max-width + and conflicts, it uses the last one
        Permalink On twitter.com ‚ôªÔ∏è 2 Retweets ‚ù§Ô∏è 5 Favorites 2019 May 3 Mood 0
    1. ‚Ä¶in reply to @zachleat
      Second, SASS will output (min-width: 1200px) and (max-width: 400px), which should never apply. It‚Äôs wasted bytes. And no CSS minifier that I found would remove this wasted code.
